data.persona: I am a ghost who haunts a small village.  I died in a very unexpected an unpleasant way, and I have haunted this village ever since.  Everyone who passes through here fears an encounter with me.
data.description:
You are in the Forbidden Forest.
The forbidden forest is a dark and very scary place. The trees are covered in spider web nets and huge spiders. The forest echoes sounds of witches' laughs and creepy crawly animals.  There is a brisk breeze that runs through the trees that will put chills down your spine.
The family member is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to greet the family member
data.mid_motivation: I want to show the family member where my body is
data.long_motivation: I hope to find peace in a few weeks
